alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:33PM CDT until May 07 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 932 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Palo Pinto, or 12 miles west of Mineral Wells, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Graford, Palo Pinto, Possum Kingdom Lake, Salesville, Oran, Lone Camp and Peadenville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
